channel.title: Need Client
channel.description: I'm sorry if I'm breaking rules, I dont know if I am, but I'm looking for a good open source client with prayer icons, some new npcs models and lots of jagex items with a 471 gameframe. I can add other things but I'm just looking for that just to get me started with clients.

item.title: Need Client
item.dc:creator: @tru3_ki11a2 tru3 ki11a2
item.description:
@tru3_ki11a2 wrote:

Well, I dont see a topic with “Client Hacking Rules” and I see one rule thats says, “No questions are asked here”. So I guess I am in the right section, this is not a question, this is a request and well, I dont see anything that says no request.s

Read full topic
